kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Remove File
kw.doc: Removes a file with the given path.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: File Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails unless the given ``path`` points to an existing file.
